title: How to Remove the Scent of Detergent or Fabric Softener from Clothing

steps.title: Put the clothing out in strong sunlight for several days.
steps.content: Put the clothing out in strong sunlight for several days. This will break down any residues.

steps.title: Add one cup or more of vinegar in a load of wash to help remove some detergent residue.
steps.content: Add one cup or more of vinegar in a load of wash to help remove some detergent residue.

steps.title: Use peroxide-based laundry additives - theoretically these should oxidize residues in the fabric.
steps.content: Use peroxide-based laundry additives - theoretically these should oxidize residues in the fabric.

steps.title: Consider odor-removing products - some do work, but beware, many rely on another "cover" scent to mask the odor.
steps.content: Consider odor-removing products - some do work, but beware, many rely on another "cover" scent to mask the odor.
